description: The 1 back hands the ball to the 2 back, then fake runs to opposite play side. The 2 back takes the handoff and runs to the 3 hole. The 3 and 4 backs make blocks.

rules.name: at_hole
rules.title: Block anyone in the hole
rules.description: Anybody in the Hole? Blow 'em up!'

rules.name: at_hole
rules.title: Block anyone in the hole
rules.description: Anybody in the Hole? Blow 'em up!'

ballCarrier.responsibility:
Take handoff from QB

Secure the ball.

Run to 3 hole.
